com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.configuration

Interface ConfigurationType

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BuiltInConfigurationType, MotorConfigurationType, UserConfigurationType, UserI2cSensorType

    public interface ConfigurationType
    ConfigurationType instances represent the type of various kinds of hardware device configurations that might exist within the SDK.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ConfigurationType.DisplayNameFlavor 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDisplayName(ConfigurationType.DisplayNameFlavor flavor, Context context)
      Returns a user-understandable string form of this configuration type
      java.lang.String getXmlTag()
      Returns the XML element tag to be used when serializing configurations of this type
      boolean isDeviceFlavor(UserConfigurationType.Flavor flavor)
      Returns whether this configuration type is of the indicated flavor
      DeviceManager.DeviceType toUSBDeviceType()
      If this configuration type has a corresponding USB device configuration type, returns same; otherwise, returns FTDI_USB_UNKNOWN_DEVICE.

      • toUSBDeviceType

        DeviceManager.DeviceType toUSBDeviceType()
        If this configuration type has a corresponding USB device configuration type, returns same; otherwise, returns FTDI_USB_UNKNOWN_DEVICE.
        Returns:
        the USB device type that corresponds to this configuration type, if any
